014package org.jdbi.v3.core.statement;
015
016import java.sql.Connection;
017import java.sql.DatabaseMetaData;
018import java.sql.ResultSet;
019import java.sql.SQLException;
020import java.util.function.Supplier;
021
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.Handle;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.result.ResultBearing;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.result.ResultSetScanner;
025
026/**
027 * Access to Database Metadata.
028 */
029public final class MetaData extends BaseStatement<MetaData> implements ResultBearing {
030
031    private final Handle handle;
032    private final MetaDataValueProvider<?> metaDataFunction;
033
034    public MetaData(Handle handle, MetaDataValueProvider<?> metaDataFunction) {
035        super(handle);
036        this.handle = handle;
037        this.metaDataFunction = metaDataFunction;
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public <R> R scanResultSet(ResultSetScanner<R> mapper) {
042        return ResultBearing.of(getResultSetSupplier(), getContext())
043            .scanResultSet(mapper);
044    }
045
046    @SuppressWarnings("TypeParameterUnusedInFormals")
047    public <R> R execute() {
048        try {
049            Connection connection = handle.getConnection();
050            return (R) metaDataFunction.provideValue(connection.getMetaData());
051        } catch (SQLException e) {
052            throw new UnableToRetrieveMetaDataException(e, getContext());
053        }
054    }
055
056    @SuppressWarnings("UnnecessaryLambda") // factored out for readablity
057    private Supplier<ResultSet> getResultSetSupplier() {
058        return () -> {
059            ResultSet rs = execute();
060            getContext().addCleanable(rs::close);
061            return rs;
062        };
063    }
064
065    @FunctionalInterface
066    public interface MetaDataValueProvider<T> {
067
068        T provideValue(DatabaseMetaData databaseMetaData) throws SQLException;
069    }
070
071    @FunctionalInterface
072    public interface MetaDataResultSetProvider extends MetaDataValueProvider<ResultSet> {
073
074        @Override
075        ResultSet provideValue(DatabaseMetaData databaseMetaData) throws SQLException;
076    }
077}
